author: hustla187
title: Great Tiny Turbo
review: This Tiny Turbo reminds me of a Nissan Skyline or a Mazda RX-7. I like the design of the vehicle and Lego used the right pieces for this one, which is perfect for the Tiny Turbo. As usual, stickers are included which makes it a hassle and I recommend not putting stickers on the front bumper. This is a great set and it is a must own for Tiny Turbo fans.

author: Firox_5000
title: Neat car but please the stickers
review:
This is a very neat racers car. the details on the lights on the front , back and roof is really good.

 

My only complaint is that there are too many stickers in this set and lego should print them on I think.

author: jerrie11
title: the second best 2009 tiny turbo single
review:
Box/Instructions

cool capsule

Parts

well, the parts are great

Minifigures

none but that is fine

The build

easy but fun

The completed model

it looks so good with stickers and i don't have a problem with stickers.

Overall opinion

second best single of 2009
